titleStmt.title: The Cavaliers catechisme: or, The reformed Protestant catechising the antichristian papists, malignants, incendiaries, and other ill-affected persons under the name of cavaliers. With their distinct answer thereunto.

notesStmt.note: A different work than Wing C1568: The cavaliers catechisme, and confession of his faith.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
